data.actual_result: After a few times, you cannot click on anything and must refresh to fix it
data.expected_result: You continue entering and exiting normally
data.short_description: When going into channel settings and clicking esc immediatly and going back in consecutively, after a few times, you cannot click anything and have to refresh
data.steps_to_repro: - Click channel settings (Text or voice) - Click esc immediatly (Spam it) - Immediatly go back to channel settings (Spam click where the channel settings gear would be when you're out of the menu) - Continue doing this til you esc does nothing
